group_1.textRight: *Giggle*

group_1.textLeft: You've got a big grin on your face.

group_1.textRight: So do you, Rena.

group_1.textLeft: Uh...

group_1.textRight: I'm glad you and Kaede got such pretty swimsuits.

group_1.textLeft: Yup!
Well, yeah...
I can't wait to put it on and play!
Momoko, are you sure you're okay with not@buying a new one?

group_1.textRight: I don't need it.
See, I spent a lot of my allowance on the live@concert tour,
so I'm gonna have to cut back for the rest of@the summer.

group_1.textLeft: I see...

group_1.textRight: Don't give me that look.
It was fun helping you two pick out your@swimsuits.

group_1.textLeft: Well, next time you'll have to come to the beach@with us.
Then you'll get to see how they look for real!

group_1.textRight: Yeah! I want to play with you guys at the beach!
Alright then, let's head over as soon as possible.@How about this weekend?

group_1.textLeft: Yes! How about we spend the night, too?

group_1.textRight: Hmm...I don't think we'd be allowed to do that@on our own.
Oh, speaking of spending the night...
I heard everyone at Mikazuki Villa is renting a@lodge at the beach.

group_1.textLeft: A lodge! We could have a blast there!
We can't stay out alone, but with Yachiyo around,@it'd be okay...
Let's ask if we can all camp together!

group_1.textRight: Oh, you...
Mikazuki Villa isn't too far away. Why don't we@head over and ask right now?

group_1.textLeft: Come on, let's go!

group_1.textRight: Yachiyo!
Is it true that everyone at Mikazuki is renting a@lodge at the beach?!

group_1.textLeft: Word travels fast.
Well, yes, we are.

group_1.textRight: Um...please let us join you!

group_1.textLeft: What? Are you sure?

group_1.textRight: W-what?

group_1.textLeft: I just thought a request like that was unusual@coming from you.

group_1.textRight: Uh, yeah, I guess so, but...
Since we want to go all out, we need to find a@place near the beach where we can stay.

group_1.textLeft: Well, if you insist, you can come with us.

group_1.textRight: I did it...!
Thank you!
Sorry, Yachiyo...

group_1.textLeft: It's fine. The more people we have, the more@we might accomplish.

group_1.textRight: Eh, what?

group_1.textLeft: Everyone's getting ready for the lodge, right?
Are you guys bringing any toys or stuff to@play with? Oh, did you buy new swimsuits?

group_1.textRight: Rena and I got new swimsuits together!@We're all set!

group_1.textLeft: Are you sure you guys haven't misunderstood@why we're staying at the lodge...?

group_1.textRight: Misunderstood...?

group_1.textLeft: Playing will be fine, but you have to finish your@homework first.

group_1.textRight: ...What?

group_1.textLeft: This trip ain't gonna be a game, you know.
Yes, we're doing a study camp.
[chara:101501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]We're going for three days and two nights, right?@I'm so excited!
